duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support for an integrated manufacturing execution platform
Develop methods for maintaining and documenting adherence to client policies and procedures for manufacturing and information systems
Play a key role in the design, development, and implementation of Manufacturing IT systems capabilities
Support manufacturing and reporting systems for electronic batch records and product release
Responsible for software and data maintenance of computer systems used for development, testing, and production of bulk drug substances
Work closely within the client’s organizations in the evaluation and implementation of MES application updates and changes
Support software and configuration required for external systems interfaces such as DeltaV, SAP, LIMS, and Maximo

education_certification.credential: BS in Life Sciences or Engineering, 5 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, preferably in the biotechnology sector
